iNSTALL nOTES:
1.) Unrar and burn CD1 @ 4-16x with Alcohol 120% 1.9.5.2802 (use safedisc or safedisc 2/3 profile) or mount in d-tools 3.47. Burn CD2 and CD3 as normal since they are not protected.

2.) Install the game, use cdkey: xxxxx-xxxxx-xxxxx-xxxxx-xxxxx-xxxxx

3.) Have fun

Gerri:
please write in english if you want help.
you have to mount cd2 over cd1 if you want the installation to proceed -  it needs to have the same "drive-letter" eks:  f:/cd1 becomes f:/cd2 - get it? just like when you install a "normal" cd game. when cd1 has been copied it askes for cd2 and then you put it in the same cd/dvd-tray you used for cd1!
